name: Future Leaders of America Scholarship
description: Awarded to outstanding freshmen and sophomores pursuing undergraduate degrees in California.

name: Youth Scholarship
description: The Youth Scholarship is offered by Clay Electric Company to graduating high school seniors who are residents of their service area. Students who participate in community involvement, and extracurricular activities, and exhibit academic achievements are encouraged to apply.

name: North Carolina League For Nursing Academic Scholarship
description: The North Carolina League For Nursing Academic Scholarship is available to graduate students who have completed at least 6 semester hours of coursework in a graduate program and is approved by the CNEA for master's or doctoral degrees in nursing. Students seeking a master's or doctoral degree in nursing are eligible to apply.

name: STEM Innovators Scholarship
description: For STEM major students entering junior, senior, or fifth-year programs in Texas.

name: Portland Dreamers Scholarship
description: Financial assistance for Portland-based college students from underrepresented backgrounds.

name: Baltimore Scholars Fund
description: The 3M Open Fund Baltimore PGA Scholarship offers merit-based financial assistance to high school seniors. Students with a current or past affiliation with the Baltimore PGA Junior Golf Program are welcome to apply.

name: AICPA Scholarship for Future CPAs
description: The AICPA Scholarship for Future CPAs is awarded to undergraduate and graduate students who plan to become CPAs. Student Affiliate Members of the AICPA (Association of International Certified Professional Accountants) are welcome to apply.

name: JFEW Scholars Program at ACE at John Jay College, City University of New York
description: The JFEW Scholars Program at ACE program is open to women who are freshmen entering John Jay College, City University of New York. Applicants must be applying for the Accelerate Complete Engage (ACE) program as incoming freshmen. Students must be planning to work on a bachelor's degree in an ACE-eligible major. Residents of New York are welcome to apply.

name: Ron Brown Scholar Program
description: The Ron Brown Scholar Program seeks to identify African-American students who will make significant contributions to society.

name: Society of Women Engineers Scholarships
description: The SWE Scholarships support women pursuing undergraduate and graduate programs in engineering, technology, and computer science.

name: Davidson Fellows Scholarship
description: The Davidson Fellows Scholarship awards young people who completed significant work in STEM, literature, music, or philosophy.

name: Amazon Future Engineer Scholarship
description: The Amazon Future Engineer Scholarship offers funding for students planning to study computer science.

name: Dream.US National Scholarship
description: TheDream.US National Scholarship is for undocumented students who want to attend college.

name: Point Foundation Scholarship
description: Point Foundation empowers LGBTQ students to achieve their full academic potential.

name: Cameron Impact Scholarship
description: Full-tuition scholarship awarded to outstanding students showing leadership and community service.

name: James W. McLamore WHOPPER Scholarship
description: Awarded to high-performing graduating seniors attending college full-time.

name: Wells Fargo Scholarship Program for People with Disabilities
description: Scholarships for students with disabilities pursuing college education or career training.

name: Asian & Pacific Islander American Scholarship Fund (APIASF)
description: Provides scholarships to underserved Asian and Pacific Islander students with financial need.

name: United Negro College Fund Scholarships (UNCF)
description: UNCF manages scholarships to assist Black and African American students with college costs.

name: National Society of High School Scholars Foundation Scholarships
description: NSHSS offers scholarships for academic excellence and leadership for college students.
